attributes.action: Bring back Miss World to British TV a charity ambassador - Beauty with a Purpose
attributes.additional_details:
Negativity about Miss World & Miss England is caused by bad journalism . Whenever British TV show reports on Miss England & Miss World it features 1970s footage on how the contest used to be - not how it is now .
Facts
1. Miss World & Miss England Do not have a Swimwear PARADE on stage . This was banned in England in 2009 & replaced by the Sportsround .
2. Thousands of contestants in England Enter alongside Mr England proving its not sexist! 
3. Beauty with a Purpose is the heart of Miss World
attributes.background: Over the year Miss World has raised billions of pounds for disadvantaged children & families across the world . Miss England alone has raised thousands encouraging good role models in society , promotes recycling , health & fitness & www.beautywithapurpose.com . It needs to be back on TV !

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament don't control which programmes are shown on TV. You might like to write directly to the broadcasters to make this suggestion.
